title: Europe’s 28th regime must be ambitious in substance and legal form [Promoted Content]
summary_full: The EU's proposed 28th regime could finally unlock Europe's fragmented Single Market for startups—but only if implemented as a binding Regulation, not another layer of complexity across 27 nations.
summary_public: The EU's proposed 28th regime could finally unlock Europe's fragmented Single Market for startups—but only if implemented as a binding Regulation, not another layer of complexity across 27 nations.
